mapper.insert: insert into order (order_id, car_id, cul_id, post_pname, post_ptel, post_addr, get_pname, get_ptel, get_addr, goods_name, goods_weight, order_type, order_state, trans_post_price, delivery_price, total_price, Comment) values (#{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{carId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{culId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{postPname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{postPtel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{postAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{getPname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{getPtel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{getAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodsWeight,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transPostPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{deliveryPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{totalPrice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update order set car_id = #{carId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cul_id = #{culId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, post_pname = #{postPname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, post_ptel = #{postPtel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, post_addr = #{postAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, get_pname = #{getPname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, get_ptel = #{getPtel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, get_addr = #{getAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goods_name = #{goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goods_weight = #{goodsWeight,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_type = #{orderType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_state = #{orderState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, trans_post_price = #{transPostPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, delivery_price = #{deliveryPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, total_price = #{totalPrice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Comment = #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
